title: 01/05/22 DPS Hour 3 Al Michaels
itunes:title: 01/05/22 DPS Hour 3 Al Michaels
description:
Hall of Fame broadcaster Al Michaels joins The Dan Patrick Show to talk about some of the biggest moments from his career, and gives some personal perspective on the life of his longtime partner, John Madden.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
